text: Mortaza Hossain is an Indian politician and doctor belonging to All India Trinamool Congress. He was elected as MLA of Vidhan Sabha Constituency in 1982 and 2006. He was a minister of West Bengal Government. ==References== Category:Living people Category:All India Trinamool Congress politicians Category:West Bengal MLAs 1982–1987 Category:West Bengal MLAs 2006–2011 Category:Indian medical doctors Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Mortaza Hossain
